first_para: Benjamin Peter James Bradshaw (born 30 August 1960) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Exeter since 1997. He was the Secretary of State for Culture, Media and Sport from 2009 to 2010, and before entering politics he worked as a BBC Radio reporter.

full.extract:
Benjamin Peter James Bradshaw (born 30 August 1960) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Exeter since 1997. He was the Secretary of State for Culture, Media and Sport from 2009 to 2010, and before entering politics he worked as a BBC Radio reporter.
^ "UK Parliament Website". Retrieved 2014-01-08. 
^ "Debrett's People". Retrieved 2014-01-08.
full.title: Ben Bradshaw
